name: Social Mediæty
description:
You are an otherworldly horror who can entrance lesser beings with just the knowledge of your existence. Use social media to spread the word, and harvest the souls of your followers to pay for it!

Everything can be controlled by clicking. This game features autosaving, so if something goes terribly wrong try just opening it again and loading the autosave.

Don’t be too discouraged if you get off to a slow start! Ideas can proliferate quickly with the right tools…

--------------------------------------------------

If your video card doesn't support the renderer the normal versions use, try the OpenGL-Fallback versions instead.
